float3.h

00001 #ifndef _MATH_FLOAT3_H
00002 #define _MATH_FLOAT3_H
00003 
00004 
00005 #include <lang/pp.h>
00006 #include <math/float.h>
00007 #include <xmath.h>
00008 
00009 
00010 BEGIN_NAMESPACE(math) 
00011 
00012 
00013 class float2;
00014 
00015 
00025 class float3
00026 {
00027 public:
00029     float   x;
00030     
00032     float   y;
00033     
00035     float   z;
00036 
00037 #ifdef _DEBUG
00038 
00039     float3()                                                                        {z=y=x=getNaN();}
00040 #else                                                                               
00041     float3()                                                                        {}
00042 #endif                                                                              
00043                                                                                     
00045     float3( const float2& xy0, float z0 );
00046 
00048     float3( float x0, float y0, float z0 )                                          : x(x0), y(y0), z(z0) {}
00049         
00051     float3& operator+=( const float3& other )                                       {x+=other.x; y+=other.y; z+=other.z; return *this;}
00052                                                                                     
00054     float3& operator-=( const float3& other )                                       {x-=other.x; y-=other.y; z-=other.z; return *this;}
00055 
00057     float3& operator*=( float s )                                                   {x*=s; y*=s; z*=s; return *this;}
00058 
00060     float3& operator*=( const float3& other )                                       {x*=other.x; y*=other.y; z*=other.z; return *this;}
00061 
00063     float&      operator[]( int index )                                             {return *((&x)+index);}
00064                                                                                     
00066     float*      begin()                                                             {return &x;}
00067     
00069     float*      end()                                                               {return &x + 3;}
00070 
00072     float3      operator+( const float3& other ) const                              {return float3(x+other.x,y+other.y,z+other.z);}
00073     
00075     float3      operator-( const float3& other ) const                              {return float3(x-other.x,y-other.y,z-other.z);}
00076 
00078     float3      operator*( const float3& other ) const                              {return float3(x*other.x,y*other.y,z*other.z);}
00079 
00081     float3      operator-() const                                                   {return float3(-x,-y,-z);}
00082     
00084     float3      operator*( float s ) const                                          {return float3(x*s,y*s,z*s);}
00085     
00087     const float&    operator[]( int index ) const                                   {return *((&x)+index);}
00088 
00090     bool        operator==( const float3& other ) const                             {return x==other.x && y==other.y && z==other.z;}
00091     
00093     bool        operator!=( const float3& other ) const                             {return x!=other.x || y!=other.y || z!=other.z;}
00094 
00096     const float2& xy() const;
00097 
00099     float       length() const                                                      {return ::sqrtf( x*x + y*y + z*z );}
00100     
00102     float       lengthSquared() const                                               {return x*x + y*y + z*z;}
00103     
00105     const float*    begin() const                                                   {return &x;}
00106     
00108     const float*    end() const                                                     {return &x + 3;}
00109 
00111     float3      rotate( const float3& axis, float angle ) const;
00112 
00114     bool        finite() const;
00115 };
00116 
00117 
00121 inline float3 operator*( float s, const float3& v )
00122 {
00123     return float3( v.x*s, v.y*s, v.z*s );
00124 }
00125 
00129 inline float3 cross( const float3& a, const float3& b )
00130 {
00131     return float3( a.y*b.z-a.z*b.y, a.z*b.x-a.x*b.z, a.x*b.y-a.y*b.x );
00132 }
00133 
00137 inline float dot( const float3& a, const float3& b )
00138 {
00139     return a.x*b.x + a.y*b.y + a.z*b.z;
00140 }
00141 
00145 inline float3 normalize( const float3& v )
00146 {
00147     return v * (1.f / ::sqrtf( v.x*v.x + v.y*v.y + v.z*v.z ));
00148 }
00149 
00153 inline float3 saturate( const float3& v )
00154 {
00155     return float3( 
00156         v.x < 0.f ? 0.f : (v.x > 1.f ? 1.f : v.x),
00157         v.y < 0.f ? 0.f : (v.y > 1.f ? 1.f : v.y),
00158         v.z < 0.f ? 0.f : (v.z > 1.f ? 1.f : v.z) );
00159 }
00160 
00164 inline float3 clamp( const float3& v, const float3& minv, const float3& maxv )
00165 {
00166     return float3( 
00167         v.x < minv.x ? minv.x : (v.x > maxv.x ? maxv.x : v.x),
00168         v.y < minv.y ? minv.y : (v.y > maxv.y ? maxv.y : v.y),
00169         v.z < minv.z ? minv.z : (v.z > maxv.z ? maxv.z : v.z) );
00170 }
00171 
00175 inline float3 abs( const float3& v )
00176 {
00177     return float3( 
00178         v.x < 0.f ? -v.x : v.x,
00179         v.y < 0.f ? -v.y : v.y,
00180         v.z < 0.f ? -v.z : v.z );
00181 }
00182 
00186 float3 normalize0( const float3& v );
00187 
00188 
00189 END_NAMESPACE() // math

00192 #endif // _MATH_FLOAT3_H
